wikipedia_page.main: Dorian Jones (born 27 September 1992) is a Welsh rugby union player who plays as a fly half having previously played for Cross Keys RFC and Ebbw Vale RFC.He was released by the Dragons regional team at the end of the 2017-18 season.

response: His father, Phil Kingsley Jones, is the former manager of Jonah Lomu. Both his sons Dorian Jones and Rhys Jones are current professional rugby union players.
